Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the prime field size of a SplitKey object.
        """
kwargs = {'prime_field_size': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The prime field size must be an integer.', secrets.SplitKey, **kwargs)
args = secrets.SplitKey(), 'prime_field_size', 'invalid'
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The prime field size must be an integer.', setattr, *args)
